EyeColor: Dorsally brown, ventrally pale with dark stripes

ForewingColor: Green to white with black lines on veins
HeadColor: Black with white/yellow/blue lines and spots
EyeColor: White to light blue with distinct black stripes
AbdomenColor: Same color as head, with a quadrate dorsal indentation and a dark line lower down

ForewingColor: Mostly transparent with red patterning on the apical half
AbdomenColor: White, often restricted to the first few segments, with minimal black spots in the center of the white (often absent), sometimes a black spot at the front bottom of the white, and only a semi-quadrate black spot below

ForewingColor: Mostly transparent with red patterning on the apical half
HeadColor: Black with white/yellow/blue lines and spots
EyeColor: Entirely light blue to green with arbitrary black markings | Yellow with arbitrary black markings
AbdomenColor: White extends to posterior of abdomen, with a black spot in the center of each white area, at least an evident black line lower down (rarely broken; never speckled), and a semi-circular spot below

ForewingColor: Mostly transparent with red patterning on the apical half
AbdomenColor: White extends almost to the posterior abdomen, with a black spot in the center of each white area, and more speckled black lower down
